languages.text: Тяжелое орудие, осыпающее врагов бураном осколочных снарядов, было вмонтировано безжалостным гемункулом в тело биомашины Хтонос. Его магнитный излучатель питается разжиженной эссенцией, добытой из жертв этого монстра.

A heavy weapon capable of raining fragmentation projectiles, grafted onto the biomechanical body of the Chtonos by the cruel Haemonculus. Its magnetic radiator feeds on the liquid essence gathered from the bodies of the monster's victims.
languages.original_text: Тяжелое орудие, осыпающее врагов бураном осколочных снарядов, было вмонтировано безжалостным гемункулом в тело биомашины Хтонос. Его магнитный излучатель питается разжиженной эссенцией, добытой из жертв этого монстра.

traits.locale_text: A heavy weapon capable of raining fragmentation projectiles, grafted onto the biomechanical body of Chtonos by the cruel Haemonculus. Its magnetic radiator feeds on the liquid essence gathered from the bodies of the monster's victims.

A heavy weapon capable of raining fragmentation projectiles, grafted onto the biomechanical body of the Chtonos by the cruel Haemonculus. Its magnetic radiator feeds on the liquid essence gathered from the bodies of the monster's victims.

A heavy weapon capable of raining fragmentation projectiles, grafted onto the biomechanical body of the Chtonos by the cruel Haemonculus. Its magnetic radiator feeds on the liquid essence gathered from the bodies of the monster's victims.

languages.text: 残虐なハモンキュラスによってクロノスのバイオメカニカルボディに移植された、破片弾の雨を降らせることができるヘヴィウェポン。その磁気ラジエーターは、怪物の犠牲者の体から集められた液体エッセンスを栄養としている。
languages.original_text: A heavy weapon capable of raining fragmentation projectiles, grafted onto the biomechanical body of the Chtonos by the cruel Haemonculus. Its magnetic radiator feeds on the liquid essence gathered from the bodies of the monster's victims.

traits.locale_text: 残虐なハモンキュラスによってクロノスのバイオメカニカルボディに移植された、破片弾の雨を降らせることができるヘヴィウェポン。その磁気ラジエーターは、怪物の犠牲者の体から集められた液体エッセンスを栄養としている。

languages.text: 这种重型武器被残忍的血伶人移植到了奇托诺斯的机械身躯上。它可以发射破片弹丸，磁性散热器会自动收集受害者身体中的生命精华。
languages.original_text: A heavy weapon capable of raining fragmentation projectiles, grafted onto the biomechanical body of the Chtonos by the cruel Haemonculus. Its magnetic radiator feeds on the liquid essence gathered from the bodies of the monster's victims.

traits.locale_text: 这种重型武器被残忍的血伶人移植到了奇托诺斯的机械身躯上。它可以发射破片弹丸，磁性散热器会自动收集受害者身体中的生命精华。

languages.text: Arma pesada capaz de lanzar proyectiles de fragmentación, injertada por el cruel Hemónculo en el cuerpo biomecánico del Chtonos. Su radiador magnético se alimenta de la esencia líquida extraída de las víctimas del monstruo.
languages.original_text: A heavy weapon capable of raining fragmentation projectiles, grafted onto the biomechanical body of the Chtonos by the cruel Haemonculus. Its magnetic radiator feeds on the liquid essence gathered from the bodies of the monster's victims.

traits.locale_text: Arma pesada capaz de lanzar proyectiles de fragmentación, injertada por el cruel Hemónculo en el cuerpo biomecánico del Chtonos. Su radiador magnético se alimenta de la esencia líquida extraída de las víctimas del monstruo.

languages.text: Eine schwere Waffe, die Streugranaten hinabregnen lässt. Der grausame Haemonculus hat sie auf den biomechanischen Körper des Chtonos verpflanzt. Der Magnetstrahler wird von der flüssigen Essenz gespeist, die aus den Leichen der Opfer des Monsters gesammelt wird.
languages.original_text: A heavy weapon capable of raining fragmentation projectiles, grafted onto the biomechanical body of the Chtonos by the cruel Haemonculus. Its magnetic radiator feeds on the liquid essence gathered from the bodies of the monster's victims.

traits.locale_text: Eine schwere Waffe, die Streugranaten hinabregnen lässt. Der grausame Haemonculus hat sie auf den biomechanischen Körper des Chtonos verpflanzt. Der Magnetstrahler wird von der flüssigen Essenz gespeist, die aus den Leichen der Opfer des Monsters gesammelt wird.

languages.text: Une arme lourde qui tire des projectiles à fragmentation, fusionnée au corps biomécanique d'un Chtonos par le cruel hémoncule. Son générateur magnétique se nourrit de l'essence liquide récoltée sur les corps des victimes du monstre.
languages.original_text: A heavy weapon capable of raining fragmentation projectiles, grafted onto the biomechanical body of the Chtonos by the cruel Haemonculus. Its magnetic radiator feeds on the liquid essence gathered from the bodies of the monster's victims.

traits.locale_text: Une arme lourde qui tire des projectiles à fragmentation, fusionnée au corps biomécanique d'un Chtonos par le cruel hémoncule. Son générateur magnétique se nourrit de l'essence liquide récoltée sur les corps des victimes du monstre.

languages.text: Ktonos'un biyomekanik bedenine Haimonkulus tarafından entegre edilmiş, sağanak şeklinde menzilli saldırı yapabilme kabiliyetine sahip, ağır bir silah. Manyetik ışıyıcısı, canavarın kurbanlarının bedeninden topladığı sıvı özden besleniyor.
languages.original_text: A heavy weapon capable of raining fragmentation projectiles, grafted onto the biomechanical body of the Chtonos by the cruel Haemonculus. Its magnetic radiator feeds on the liquid essence gathered from the bodies of the monster's victims.

traits.locale_text: Ktonos'un biyomekanik bedenine Haimonkulus tarafından entegre edilmiş, sağanak şeklinde menzilli saldırı yapabilme kabiliyetine sahip, ağır bir silah. Manyetik ışıyıcısı, canavarın kurbanlarının bedeninden topladığı sıvı özden besleniyor.
